repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
With clang 14+ and `-Werror,-Wbitwise-instead-of-logical` build failed with:
```
$(BUILD_ROOT)/library/python/cyson/cyson/_cyson.pyx.cpp:29973:39: error: use of bitwise '&' with boolean operands [-Werror,-Wbitwise-instead-of-logical]
  if (CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON && ((__pyx_freecount_5cyson_6_cyson_InputStream < 16) & (Py_TYPE(o)->tp_basicsize == sizeof(struct __pyx_obj_5cyson_6_cyson_InputStream)) & ((Py_TYPE(o)->tp_flags & (Py_TPFLAGS_IS_ABSTRACT | Py_TPFLAGS_HEAPTYPE)) == 0))) {
                                     ~^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
                                                                                                                                                                            &&
$(BUILD_ROOT)/library/python/cyson/cyson/_cyson.pyx.cpp:29973:39: note: cast one or both operands to int to silence this warning
```

comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -1535,10 +1535,10 @@ def generate_new_function(self, scope, code, cclass_entry):
                 if is_final_type:
                     type_safety_check = ''
                 else:
-                    type_safety_check = ' & (!__Pyx_PyType_HasFeature(t, (Py_TPFLAGS_IS_ABSTRACT | Py_TPFLAGS_HEAPTYPE)))'
+                    type_safety_check = ' && (!__Pyx_PyType_HasFeature(t, (Py_TPFLAGS_IS_ABSTRACT | Py_TPFLAGS_HEAPTYPE)))'
                 obj_struct = type.declaration_code("", deref=True)
                 code.putln(
-                    "if (CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON && likely((%s > 0) & (t->tp_basicsize == sizeof(%s))%s)) {" % (
+                    "if (CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON && likely((%s > 0) && (t->tp_basicsize == sizeof(%s))%s)) {" % (

@@ -1765,11 +1765,11 @@ def generate_dealloc_function(self, scope, code):
                     type_safety_check = ''
                 else:
                     type_safety_check = (
-                        ' & (!__Pyx_PyType_HasFeature(Py_TYPE(o), (Py_TPFLAGS_IS_ABSTRACT | Py_TPFLAGS_HEAPTYPE)))')
+                        ' && (!__Pyx_PyType_HasFeature(Py_TYPE(o), (Py_TPFLAGS_IS_ABSTRACT | Py_TPFLAGS_HEAPTYPE)))')

@@ -1765,11 +1765,11 @@ def generate_dealloc_function(self, scope, code):
                     type_safety_check = ''
                 else:
                     type_safety_check = (
-                        ' & (!__Pyx_PyType_HasFeature(Py_TYPE(o), (Py_TPFLAGS_IS_ABSTRACT | Py_TPFLAGS_HEAPTYPE)))')
+                        ' && (!__Pyx_PyType_HasFeature(Py_TYPE(o), (Py_TPFLAGS_IS_ABSTRACT | Py_TPFLAGS_HEAPTYPE)))')
 
                 type = scope.parent_type
                 code.putln(
-                    "if (CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON && ((%s < %d) & (Py_TYPE(o)->tp_basicsize == sizeof(%s))%s)) {" % (
+                    "if (CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON && ((%s < %d) && (Py_TYPE(o)->tp_basicsize == sizeof(%s))%s)) {" % (

comment_data.body:
```suggestion
                    "if (CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON && ((int)(%s < %d) & (int)(Py_TYPE(o)->tp_basicsize == sizeof(%s))%s)) {" % (
```

I think this one was the wrong way round (i.e. `CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON` is known at compile time so order of evaluation really don't matter).

Other than that the cast to int seems like the cleanest way to silence the warning and preserve the existing logic
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -1765,11 +1765,11 @@ def generate_dealloc_function(self, scope, code):
                     type_safety_check = ''
                 else:
                     type_safety_check = (
-                        ' & (!__Pyx_PyType_HasFeature(Py_TYPE(o), (Py_TPFLAGS_IS_ABSTRACT | Py_TPFLAGS_HEAPTYPE)))')
+                        ' & (int)(!__Pyx_PyType_HasFeature(Py_TYPE(o), (Py_TPFLAGS_IS_ABSTRACT | Py_TPFLAGS_HEAPTYPE)))')
 
                 type = scope.parent_type
                 code.putln(
-                    "if (CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON && ((%s < %d) & (Py_TYPE(o)->tp_basicsize == sizeof(%s))%s)) {" % (
+                    "if (CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON & (int)((%s < %d) && (Py_TYPE(o)->tp_basicsize == sizeof(%s))%s)) {" % (

comment_data.body:
```suggestion
                    "if (CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON && likely((int)(%s > 0) & (int)(t->tp_basicsize == sizeof(%s))%s)) {" % (
```

Probably makes sense to cast both arguments to `int` if we're going to be doing this
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -1535,10 +1535,10 @@ def generate_new_function(self, scope, code, cclass_entry):
                 if is_final_type:
                     type_safety_check = ''
                 else:
-                    type_safety_check = ' & (!__Pyx_PyType_HasFeature(t, (Py_TPFLAGS_IS_ABSTRACT | Py_TPFLAGS_HEAPTYPE)))'
+                    type_safety_check = ' & (int)(!__Pyx_PyType_HasFeature(t, (Py_TPFLAGS_IS_ABSTRACT | Py_TPFLAGS_HEAPTYPE)))'
                 obj_struct = type.declaration_code("", deref=True)
                 code.putln(
-                    "if (CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON && likely((%s > 0) & (t->tp_basicsize == sizeof(%s))%s)) {" % (
+                    "if (CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON && likely((%s > 0) & (int)(t->tp_basicsize == sizeof(%s))%s)) {" % (

commit.message:
Fix use of bitwise '&' with boolean operands

With clang 14+ and `-Werror,-Wbitwise-instead-of-logical` build failed with:
```
$(BUILD_ROOT)/library/python/cyson/cyson/_cyson.pyx.cpp:29973:39: error: use of bitwise '&' with boolean operands [-Werror,-Wbitwise-instead-of-logical]
  if (CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON && ((__pyx_freecount_5cyson_6_cyson_InputStream < 16) & (Py_TYPE(o)->tp_basicsize == sizeof(struct __pyx_obj_5cyson_6_cyson_InputStream)) & ((Py_TYPE(o)->tp_flags & (Py_TPFLAGS_IS_ABSTRACT | Py_TPFLAGS_HEAPTYPE)) == 0))) {
                                     ~^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
                                                                                                                                                                            &&
$(BUILD_ROOT)/library/python/cyson/cyson/_cyson.pyx.cpp:29973:39: note: cast one or both operands to int to silence this warning
```

committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1666757111 +0300

Fix use of bitwise '&' with boolean operands

With clang 14+ and `-Werror,-Wbitwise-instead-of-logical` build failed with:
```
$(BUILD_ROOT)/library/python/cyson/cyson/_cyson.pyx.cpp:29973:39: error: use of bitwise '&' with boolean operands [-Werror,-Wbitwise-instead-of-logical]
  if (CYTHON_COMPILING_IN_CPYTHON && ((__pyx_freecount_5cyson_6_cyson_InputStream < 16) & (Py_TYPE(o)->tp_basicsize == sizeof(struct __pyx_obj_5cyson_6_cyson_InputStream)) & ((Py_TYPE(o)->tp_flags & (Py_TPFLAGS_IS_ABSTRACT | Py_TPFLAGS_HEAPTYPE)) == 0))) {
                                     ~^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
                                                                                                                                                                            &&
$(BUILD_ROOT)/library/python/cyson/cyson/_cyson.pyx.cpp:29973:39: note: cast one or both operands to int to silence this warning
```

repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

milestone.description:
Goals:
 New version scheme: 3.x instead of 0.x.
 Change default `language_level` from `2` to `3str`.
 Change default for `binding` directive from `False` to `True`.
 Fix some Python compatibility issues (if possible, allowing for breaking changes).

title: Fix use of bitwise '&' with boolean operands
